links: P. De Geest, Squares containing at most three distinct digits, Index entries for related sequences
mathematica: fQ[n_] := Union[ Join[{4, 6, 9}, IntegerDigits[n]]] == {4, 6, 9}; lst = {}; Do[ If[ fQ[n^2], AppendTo[lst, n^2]], {n, 2*10^9}]; lst (* _Robert G. Wilson v_, Jun 01 2005 *)
author: _Patrick De Geest_, Mar 15 2000
